nodes.text: Walisi was a Toydarian who bought and sold rare objects, such as the statue Tragic Hope. Soon after announcing that he planned to sell the statue, however, Walisi disappeared. Walisi's ally, the Gorensla kajidic, investigated the disappearance and incorrectly believed their enemy, the Desilijic kajidic, to be responsible. In reality, he was kidnapped by Jerserra.
